page.title: 17Childrens Leisure Activities
page.content: Four people went to Cubs, Five people went to Brownies, Five people went Horse Riding, Three people went to Ballet/ Dancing, Five people went to Musical Lessons, Six people go to Mini Rugby Twenty people go to Swimming, Seven people go to Cricket, Four people go to Tennis. Four people are in the Choir, Ten people go to Football. OUR FAVOURITE TELEVISION PROGRAMMES Three people watched "Playuschool", Twelve people watched "Dungens And Dragons". Severn people liked the "A-Team", One person watched "Are You Awake Yet". Four people liked "Biskets", Two people liked "Button Moon". Twelve people liked "Knight Rider", Sixteen people liked "Street Hawk".
